meaning_english: To reduce in intensity. Synonyms: Diminish, Decrease, Subside, Lessen.
To officially end something. Synonyms: Eliminate, Eradicate, Terminate, Repeal.
To refrain from doing something. Synonyms: Refrain, Avoid, Withhold, Desist.
Very severe or intense. Synonyms: Intense, Severe, Sharp, Extreme.
Unfavorable or harmful. Synonyms: Unfavorable, Detrimental, Hostile, Harmful.
Friendly and pleasant. Synonyms: Friendly, Affable, Cordial, Pleasant.
To understand or arrest. Synonyms: Comprehend, Grasp, Seize, Capture.
Bold and daring. Synonyms: Bold, Daring, Fearless, Intrepid.
To confuse completely. Synonyms: Confuse, Perplex, Bewilder, Puzzle.
To persuade by flattery. Synonyms: Persuade, Coax, Flatter, Wheedle.
To hide something. Synonyms: Hide, Cover, Mask, Suppress.
To agree with. Synonyms: Agree, Approve, Consent, Assent.
To control or restrain. Synonyms: Restrain, Control, Check, Limit.
To mislead someone. Synonyms: Cheat, Trick, Mislead, Delude.
To resist boldly. Synonyms: Resist, Challenge, Oppose, Disobey.
To discourage from acting. Synonyms: Prevent, Discourage, Hinder, Obstruct.
To decrease gradually. Synonyms: Shrink, Decline, Reduce, Lessen.
To draw out a response. Synonyms: Extract, Obtain, Evoke, Bring out.
An attempt or effort. Synonyms: Attempt, Effort, Strive, Try.
To encourage development. Synonyms: Encourage, Promote, Support, Nurture.
Economical and careful with money. Synonyms: Thrifty, Economical, Sparing, Prudent.
To create obstacles. Synonyms: Obstruct, Impede, Block, Prevent.
To weaken or damage. Synonyms: Damage, Weaken, Harm, Deteriorate.
Clear and easy to understand. Synonyms: Clear, Transparent, Intelligible, Plain.
Watchful and alert. Synonyms: Alert, Watchful, Cautious, Observant.
